values.value: +2 dice for detection and combat spells; +2 dice for conjuring forest or prairie spirits (shaman's choice).
Wolf is the hunter and warrior. He is brother to all his pack, and fiercely loyal to his mate and cubs. As the andent saying goes, Wolf wins every fight but the last, and In that one, he dies.

A Wolf shaman is loyal to his friends and family until death. Nothing can make him betray those bonds. Nor will he ever show cowardice. When a Wolf shaman extends his protection to another or otherwise accepts a responsibility, nothing can make him betray that bond. Wolf can, however, go berserk as a Bear does.
